title: amd_catalyst_11.4_preview_win7_march7.7z
description:
Hi there
new AMD Catalyst 11.4 preview for Vista/win7 both version is now avalaible...

What's a new :

Catalyst 11.4 early preview Back 

Last Updated 
3/7/2011 

Article Number 
gpu-102 

AMD CatalystÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ 11.4 early preview ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œMjÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶lnirÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ 

AMD CatalystÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Driver 11.4 early Preview Features: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Delivers performance enhancements for the AMD RadeonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ HD 6000 Series & Windows 7. 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Includes enhancements to the AMD Catalyst Control CenterÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ 
o New task based Display Management controls 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ Simplifies the configuration of displays and display settings 
o New Eyefinity setup group 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ Setting up an Eyefinity group has never been easier 
o New branding (based on system configuration) 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ AMD based platform ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ AMD VISION Engine Control Center 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ Discrete AMD GPU with Intel CPU ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ AMD Catalyst Control CenterÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ 
o AMD Catalyst update notification (found within the Information Center) 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ Please note this functionality is not yet enabled, but will be in a future AMD Catalyst release 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ This feature will be used to notify users that new AMD Catalyst software packages are available 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Fixed cases where Dragon Age 2 would hang in DirectX11 on ATI RadeonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ HD 5800 Series products. 

Instructions: 

Download and install the AMD Catalyst driver hotfix from the following location: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AMD CatalystÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Driver 11.4 early Preview for Windows 7 

Refer to Article GPU-33 for detailed instructions on how to properly install the AMD CatalystÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Driver 11.4 early Preview. 
Note! This Preview is provided ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œAS ISÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ in accordance with the End User License Agreement
